level.heading: Membership interest not transferable.
level.text: Except as otherwise provided in the governing principles, a member's interest or any right under the governing principles shall not be transferable.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 21 of the Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (2008 Act).
